    • Method Detail

      • wasPadding

        boolean wasPadding()
        Returns:
        true if the last index(long) looked up as padding.

      • index

        long index()
        Returns:
        this appender is pointing.

      • lastWrittenIndex

        long lastWrittenIndex()
        Returns:
        the index last written to including padded entries.

      • size

        long size()
        This is an upper bound for the number of entires available. This includes padded entries.
        Specified by:
        size in interface net.openhft.lang.io.BytesStore
        Returns:
        lastWrittenIndex() + 1

      • toEnd

        Wind to the end.
        Returns:
        this Excerpt

      • chronicle

        Chronicle chronicle()
        Returns:
        the chronicle associated with this Excerpt

      • finish

        void finish()
        Finish reading or writing. This checks there was not a buffer overflow and shrink wraps new entries and adds them to the index
        Specified by:
        finish in interface net.openhft.lang.io.BytesCommon
